title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning Course Utilizing Information Literacy Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify three or more information sources required for conducting scientific research
Apply information search strategies to locate three or more relevant materials within five minutes in academic databases
Self-assess information literacy levels through evaluation tools and develop improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
